thread.title: Mumbai Food: Andheri gets a new hangout place! - Life and style
thread.title_full: Mumbai Food: Andheri gets a new hangout place! - Life and style

author: The Guide Team
title: Mumbai Food: Andheri gets a new hangout place! - Life and style
text:
Andheri, already bursting at the seams with eateries, gets yet another addition to the scene in the form of Above&Beyond, an all day cafe situated on Mahakali Caves Road.
The 1,100 sqft space is split into two levels â€” the lower one features industrial elements, while Moroccan accents dominate the upper level.
The menu features modern European cuisine with Indian and Arabic influences. Signature dishes include Mumbai Street Sandwich, Cajun Spiced Vegetable Burger, Mushroom and Caramelized Onion Sandwich (in pic), Sundried Tomato Polenta Square and Potholes of Mumbai Flyover with potato and onion masala, fried egg, and brun pav.
There are also house-brewed coffees and in-house desserts to dig into. The upper level will also serve sheesha in a variety of flavours.

AT:  Ramanna Compound, Mahakali Caves Road, Andheri (E). 
TIME:  7.30 am to 12 am
CALL:  65605544
